text: Anna loved looking at the night sky and drawing pictures of rockets and silver stars in her notebook.
scene: Anna sitting at her desk by the window at night, sketching rockets and stars, a small telescope beside her

text: One evening, a tiny glowing seed rolled out of her notebook and pulsed with soft blue light.
scene: close-up of Anna holding a glowing blue seed in her palm, surprised, moonlight shining through the window

text: The window opened by itself, revealing a glass walkway stretching up to a floating garden among the stars.
scene: Anna stepping onto a glowing glass walkway leading to a greenhouse floating in space, Earth visible below

text: Inside the greenhouse, a friendly robot gardener named Ivy waved. "Our starflowers are wilting. Will you help?"
scene: small friendly robot with leaf-shaped antennas greeting Anna inside a space greenhouse filled with plants

text: A shimmering bubble formed around Anna so she could breathe as she walked between rows of glowing plants.
scene: Anna inside a gentle transparent bubble walking past beds of bioluminescent plants under starry windows

text: Ivy showed her a bottle labeled "starlight water." Together they sprinkled it onto the sleepy starflowers.
scene: Anna pouring sparkling water from a crystal bottle onto drooping star-shaped flowers while Ivy holds a tray

text: The flowers woke up and stretched their petals, filling the air with tiny floating lights that hummed like songs.
scene: star-shaped flowers glowing brighter, tiny lights drifting upward like fireflies, Anna smiling

text: Suddenly, a meteor passed nearby and a hairline crack appeared in a greenhouse pane.
scene: a faint crack in the glass wall of the greenhouse, a meteor streak outside, Anna and Ivy noticing

text: Anna used glowing vine tape Ivy handed her, sealing the crack while the starflowers wrapped their leaves around it to help.
scene: Anna pressing luminous vine tape over a crack while plants reach their leaves to brace the glass

text: Alarms chimed gently. A star-butterfly habitat door had stuck open, and the tiny butterflies drifted loose.
scene: small luminous butterflies floating toward the greenhouse ceiling, a door stuck ajar, Anna and Ivy reaching

text: Anna coaxed them back with a trail of starlight water droplets, guiding them into their cozy habitat.
scene: Anna making a sparkling droplet path while star-butterflies follow, Ivy holding the door wide

text: The biggest star tree in the center burst into bloom, releasing silver pollen like a gentle snowfall.
scene: tall tree in the greenhouse opening bright blooms, silver pollen drifting, Anna and Ivy looking amazed

text: Through the glass roof they spotted the Moon Garden next door, dim and chilly without its usual glow.
scene: view from the greenhouse into a darker moonlit garden space, pale plants drooping slightly

text: Ivy said the Moon Garden lantern had gone out. Anna carried the relit starflower lantern across the walkway.
scene: Anna carrying a glowing lantern made of starflowers across a glass bridge to the Moon Garden

text: The moonlit plants brightened as the lantern arrived, and soft lunar moths fluttered awake in thanks.
scene: pale plants glowing in cool light, lunar moths fluttering around Anna and the lantern

text: On the way back, Anna spotted a lonely seedling shivering in a corner. She tucked it into her bubble to warm it.
scene: Anna placing a tiny seedling inside her glowing bubble, Ivy smiling nearby

text: In the main greenhouse, the plants swayed in a slow dance, and Ivy played a gentle chime to thank her.
scene: plants gently bending in rhythm while Ivy rings a soft chime, Anna watching happily

text: "For your window back home," Ivy said, handing her a pocket planter with the warmed seedling inside.
scene: Ivy passing Anna a small crystal planter holding the glowing seedling, stars shining beyond the glass

text: Anna stepped back through the glass walkway, the seedling glowing brighter with each step.
scene: Anna walking down the glass bridge toward her house, seedling bright in her hands, Earth growing larger

text: She woke in her room at sunrise. On her sill, the pocket planter shimmered softly, and a single star-butterfly perched beside it.
scene: Anna waking in bed at dawn, a tiny glowing planter and star-butterfly on the windowsill, morning light coming in
